variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: De-identified Subject's ID

variable.name: Age
variable.description: Age of subject

variable.name: Gender
variable.description: Gender of subject

variable.name: Yob
variable.description: Year of subject's birth

variable.name: Race
variable.description: Race of subject (Caucasian)

variable.name: Ethnicity
variable.description: Ethnicity of subject (not Hispanic/Latino, Hispanic/Latino)

variable.name: Onset_Age
variable.description: Onset age of disease

variable.name: Clinical_Data_Source
variable.description: Source of clinical data (neurologist, registered nurse, research coordinator, research coordinator/registered nurse)

variable.name: Clinician_Type
variable.description: Type of clinician [neurologist; primary care physician (GP, family doctor, or internist); psychiatrist]

variable.name: Country_Origin
variable.description: Country of subject's origin (USA)

variable.name: Family History:Family history of parkinsonism
variable.description: Family history: family history of parkinsonism

variable.name: Longitudinal Data:Is this data Longitudinal (Follow-Up) Data?
variable.description: Longitudinal data: is this data longitudinal (follow-up) data? (no)

variable.name: Optional data:Handedness
variable.description: Handedness (right, left, ambidextrous)

variable.name: Optional data:Hoehn and Yahr
variable.description: Hoehn and Yahr score

variable.name: Optional data:Mini-mental status score
variable.description: Mini-mental status score

variable.name: Optional data:UPDRS total motor score
variable.description: UPDRS (Unified PD Rating Scale) total motor score

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:axial rigidity
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: axial rigidity (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:cerebellar signs (other than activation tremor)
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: cerebellar signs (other than activation tremor) (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:dysautonomia
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: dysautonomia (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:fluctuations
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: fluctuations (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:gaze palsy
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: gaze palsy (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:hallucinations
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: hallucinations (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:history of encephalitis
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: history of encephalitis (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:history of head injury with loss of consciousness
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: history of head injury with loss of consciousness

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:history of strokes or stepwise deterioration
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: history of strokes or stepwise deterioration (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:memory loss
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: memory loss

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:neuroleptic treatment at time of symptom onset
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: neuroleptic treatment at time of symptom onset (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:Oculogyric crisis
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: oculogyric crisis (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:Other
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: other

variable.name: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis:sustained remission
variable.description: Signs suggestive of another diagnosis: sustained remission (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis:Activation tremor
variable.description: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis: activation tremor (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis:Asymmetric onset
variable.description: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis: asymmetric onset (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis:Bradykinesis
variable.description: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis: bradykinesis (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis:Gait difficulties
variable.description: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis: gait difficulties (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis:Postural Instability
variable.description: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis: postural instability (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis:Response to Anti-Parkinsonism Therapy
variable.description: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis: response to anti-parkinsonism therapy (inadequate dose, not tried/not given, tried and responsive)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis:Resting Tremor
variable.description: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis: resting tremor (absent, present)

variable.name: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis:Rigidity
variable.description: Signs suggestive of PD diagnosis: rigidity (absent, present)

variable.name: Smoking History:smoking history
variable.description: Smoking history (never, former smoker, current smoker)

variable.name: Smoking History:years smoking
variable.description: Years smoking

variable.name: Specific diagnosis:Mutation/s in subject's DNA (if present, describe)
variable.description: Specific diagnosis: mutation/s in subject's DNA

variable.name: Specific diagnosis:Parkinsonism clinical diagnosis
variable.description: Specific diagnosis: parkinsonism, clinical diagnosis
